title: Top Five All-in-One-Day Movies and 'The Lovebirds'
description:
The new Netflix film 'The Lovebirds' falls into a classic bucket: the all-in-one-day movie. Sean and Amanda talk about what works (and what doesn't) in the Kumail Nanjiani–Issa Rae comedy. Then, they share their top-five all-in-one-day movies. All killer, no filler.
Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
